com.mtgox.api

Interface TradeInterface

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MtGox

    public interface TradeInterface

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String buyBTC(double amount)
      Sells BTC at market price
      double[] getBalance()
      Returns an array with the user's balance in different currencies.
      java.lang.String getLag()
      Returns the lag of the trading engine.
      double getLastPriceEUR()
      Returns an array with the last price in USD and EUR.
      double getLastPriceUSD()
      Returns an array with the last price in USD and EUR.
      java.lang.String sellBTC(double amount)
      Sells BTC at market price
      java.lang.String withdrawBTC(double amount, java.lang.String dest_address)
      Withdraws an amount of BTC from the user's mtg account to a BTC address.

    • Method Detail

      • getBalance

        double[] getBalance()
        Returns an array with the user's balance in different currencies. The first element of the array is the amount in BTC, the second element in USD and the third in EUR.
        Returns:
        an array with the current balance

      • getLastPriceUSD

        double getLastPriceUSD()
        Returns an array with the last price in USD and EUR.
        Returns:
        a double value with the current price of 1 BTC in USD

      • getLastPriceEUR

        double getLastPriceEUR()
        Returns an array with the last price in USD and EUR.
        Returns:
        a double value with the current price of 1 BTC in EUR

      • getLag

        java.lang.String getLag()
        Returns the lag of the trading engine.
        Returns:
        a string with the lag

      • withdrawBTC

        java.lang.String withdrawBTC(double amount,
                           java.lang.String dest_address)
        Withdraws an amount of BTC from the user's mtg account to a BTC address.
        Parameters:
        amount - the amount of BTC to withdraw (min 0.1)
        dest_address - the address of the BTC wallet
        Returns:
        the transaction id (if success), (???) if failed //TODO

      • sellBTC

        java.lang.String sellBTC(double amount)
        Sells BTC at market price
        Parameters:
        amount - the amount of BTC to sell (min 0.1)
        Returns:
        the transaction id (if success), (???) if failed //TODO

      • buyBTC

        java.lang.String buyBTC(double amount)
        Sells BTC at market price
        Parameters:
        amount - the amount of BTC to buy (min 0.1)
        Returns:
        the transaction id (if success), (???) if failed //TODO
